settings.title: Delivery
settings.content:
•Delivery with DHL within 1-2 working days.
•For Local Pick Up in London please contact us directly.
•Free Shipping
• Purchases are delivered in the orginal packaging and then bubble wrapped for safe shipping.

•You will receive your receipt via email.

settings.title: Condition Guide
settings.content:
Unworn / Unused

These pieces have never been used. They have also been stored perfectly, and have no signs of wear or use. They will come with original tags and receipt.

Excellent

These items will appear unworn but have been used. These items will have no signs of wear and no scratches.

Very Good

With minimal use and wear. Scratches may only be seen up close and must be small.

settings.text: We are not affiliated with the brands we sell. Please note that all of our items are pre-owned and sold on behalf of private individual sellers. All our items come with an authenticity guarantee. All sales are final. All international purchases are sent duties unpaid.

settings.title: Payment Methods
settings.content:
We accept a variety of payment methods:

Visa®, MasterCard®, Maestro®, American Express®, Apple Pay & Paypal.

If you would like to pay using WeChat Pay or Alipay, please contact us directly.

settings.title: Restrictions
settings.content: Any items that include exotic skins or restricted materials, will be subject to delay when shipping internationally. Please allow up to 30 days while UK customs clearance is provided.
